author: jmduarte
body:
This adds the DeepDoubleB TensorFlow based model which is based on a lot of the changes brought in from the DeepFlavour pull request #19893. The [latest BTV meeting presentation](https://indico.cern.ch/event/718578/contributions/2954890/) provides more information about the tagger.

We've checked the compatibility between CMSSW-based discriminators computed using the producers in this PR with the output from the training framework (DeepJet) on a ttbar RelVal sample:

MINIAOD vs reference training framework:
https://cernbox.cern.ch/index.php/s/f8bJcJcS8hfU3WF
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4932543/39014280-9103f96e-43df-11e8-80cb-3637bb9ad8dd.png)

RECO vs reference training framework:
https://cernbox.cern.ch/index.php/s/hEqbrrMkz5xBSHs
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4932543/39014315-a63d143c-43df-11e8-95e7-5577c3032f9b.png)
The level of discrepancy is similar to what was observed for the DeepFlavour model, as we also train using MINIAOD inputs.

We also checked that our changes don't affect the existing DeepFlavour model:
https://cernbox.cern.ch/index.php/s/KHs8RKuE0qzREq4
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4932543/39014251-75606148-43df-11e8-8ffc-089c83a97478.png)
@cvernier @ferencek
title: TensorFlow-based DeepDoubleB tagger integration
